links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Amarnath Murthy & Charles Ashbacher, Fabricating a perfect square with a given valid digit sum, in Generalized Partitions and New Ideas On Number Theory and Smarandache Sequences, pp 154-156.
prog: (PARI) { b=0; for (n=1, 1000, until (s==7, b++; s=b^2; s-=9*(s\9)); write("b061101.txt", n, " ", b^2) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 18 2009](PARI) a(n)=(n\2*9-4*(-1)^n)^2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 21 2012
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 19 2001
extensions: More terms from _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 18 2009
